ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Apple News team is looking for a Gray Box Software QA Engineer to work on the next generation of application/services. This position requires a self-motivated individual with strong problem solving skills who can contribute in a dynamic team environment.

ul.li: Strong Java or other Object Oriented Programming Language
Proven bug detection and bug isolation skills
Familiar with the SQA requirements and demands of a full product cycle
Strong hands on experience with QA methodologies, or prior QA experience
Comfortable and adaptable in a high-paced and informal environment
Creative thinker and passionate about quality

div.p:
The candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and executing test plans and test suites based on specification documents and access to databases. The candidate will ensure the successful delivery of a quality product by performing ad-hoc and structured tests on a daily basis.
Preferred: Familiarity with IntelliJ Experience with distributed database management systems Experience with load/performance testing, scalability testing, or reliability testing
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or equivalent
